title: Show 197 - John Sweeney
itunes:title: Show 197 - John Sweeney
itunes:subtitle: Welcome to one of the most gripping episodes of aâ€¦
description:
Welcome to one of the most gripping episodes of any podcast ever recorded. Investigative journalist John Sweeney shares his incredible experiences coming face-to-face with Vladimir Putin, Donald Trump, The Church of Scientology, the far right and so many more. At times terrifying, at times absolutely hilarious, all of John's amazing stories come from his ruthless pursuit of the truth. This will blow your mind. What will also blow your mind is that it could easily have been ten hours longer. Get yourself a bottle of wine and a block of cheese, you're in for a wild ride. Follow John on Twitter: @johnsweeneyroar Buy 'The Useful Idiot' and John's other books here: https://smile.amazon.co.uk/John-Sweeney/e/B00MDETXI6?ref=sr_ntt_srch_lnk_1&qid=1611769207&sr=1-1 See John's 'roar' on Panorama: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mjlo4u_8g60 Order 'Politically Homeless' here: https://blackwells.co.uk/bookshop/product/2100000262618 Follow Matt on Twitter: @mattforde Email the show: politicalpartypodcast@gmail.com For the latest UK Government advice on coronavirus go to: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
